IRPact_modellierung.space

Class SpatialModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • IRPact_modellierung.SimulationEntity
      • IRPact_modellierung.space.SpatialModel
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GeoSpatialModel, RectangularSpatialModel

    public abstract class SpatialModel
extends SimulationEntity
    The spatial model describes the spatial character of the simulation. It defines the metric spatial entities are situated to one another with, and provides an ability to check whether a coordinate is within the spatial model.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class IRPact_modellierung.SimulationEntity

        associatedSimulationContainer

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SpatialModel(SimulationContainer container, java.lang.String metric)
      The SpatialModel in its generality is situated within a simulation container and associated with a metric under which the distances of entities are interpreted

        public SpatialModel(SimulationContainer container,
                    java.lang.String metric)
        The SpatialModel in its generality is situated within a simulation container and associated with a metric under which the distances of entities are interpreted
        Parameters:
        container - The container the simulation is contained in

    • Method Detail

      • isWithinBoundaries

        public abstract boolean isWithinBoundaries(java.awt.geom.Point2D pointToCheck)
        Method to check whether a coordinate falls within or outside the spatial model
        Parameters:
        pointToCheck - Coordinate to check whether it lies in the model or not
        Returns:
        true if coordinate lies within the spatial model, false otherwise
